name: Ch3 wp
tagline: Wordpress snippets and utilities to make design easier.
body:
### Welcome CH3_WP 
This is a collection of functions and 
To use this repository in your theme, copy the /inc folder in your theme root and copy this to your functions.php file.
```
require_once( trailingslashit( get_template_directory() ) . 'inc/ch3/pagination.php');
require_once( trailingslashit( get_template_directory() ) . 'inc/ch3/utilities.php');
require_once( trailingslashit( get_template_directory() ) . 'inc/ch3/branding.php');
```

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
